## Weight evolution in time (Pups & Teens)

```{r}
#| echo: false

is_temporal <- TRUE

## WARN: Always put the chosen model in first position
models <- list(
  glmmTMB(
    Weight ~ Condition * Stage + ar1(Stage + 0 | Mouse),
    family = Gamma("log"),
    data = data,
    REML = TRUE
  )
  # glmmTMB(

)
```
